quiz_not_started: The quiz has not started yet
finish_modal_message: Are you sure you want to submit the quiz? You can only do this once, and the answers cannot be changed afterwards!
no_results: No results are available for this team.
waiting_for_quiz: The quiz has not started yet, please wait. Do not refresh the page!
waiting_for_results: The quiz results are not yet available, please wait. Do not refresh the page!
waiting_error: An unknown error occurred, please try again later.
want_to_play_late: Are you sure you want to start the game? If you start, you won't be able to see your previous result.
upload_failed: Failed to submit answers after multiple attempts.
check_connection: Please check your connection and try again.
